nodes.text: A male droid technician served aboard the Super Star Destroyer Executor, in the vessel's droid pool, during the ship's murder investigation into the death of Lieutenant Commander Tanith Sorn. This droid technician was critically wounded when four ASP-7 labor droids, which had been reprogrammed to murder Sorn, went berserk in the Executor's droid pool and killed or wounded several other technicians.
